mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_AUTH_ID , A.AUTH_ID , H.TENANT_ID , H.ENTER_CD , F_WTM_GET_EMP_ORG_NM(H.TENANT_ID, H.ENTER_CD, H.SABUN, H.SYMD) AS ORG_NM , H.SABUN , F_WTM_GET_EMP_NM(H.TENANT_ID, H.ENTER_CD, H.SABUN, H.SYMD) AS EMP_NM FROM WTM_EMP_HIS H JOIN WTM_USER_AUTH A ON H.EMP_ID = A.USER_KEY WHERE H.TENANT_ID = ${tenantId} AND H.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND A.AUTH_ID = ${authId} AND #{ymd} BETWEEN H.SYMD AND H.EYMD
SELECT U.AUTH_ID , R.RULE_TEXT FROM WTM_USER_AUTH U JOIN COMM_AUTH_RULE R ON U.AUTH_ID = R.AUTH_ID WHERE USER_KEY = F_WTM_AES_ENCRYPT((#{tenantId} || #{enterCd} || #{sabun}), #{enterCd})
